elements.text:
It is pretty simple; choose a font (usually
from /system/fonts/), and then paste this
into your code:

This works by poking the un-podded font
you've chosen into your cart's memory.
For example:

poke(0x4000,get(fetch("/system/fonts/lil_mono.font")))
--[[
	this sets the lil_mono.font as the font for
	your program
]]
